001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.table.annotations;
002
003import java.lang.annotation.ElementType;
004import java.lang.annotation.Retention;
005import java.lang.annotation.RetentionPolicy;
006import java.lang.annotation.Target;
007import org.openqa.selenium.support.FindBy;
008
009/**
010 * Defines metadata for locating and interacting with a table in the UI.
011 * This annotation is applied to a row model class to specify how the table is
012 * identified and structured.
013 *
014 * <p>It provides three key locators:
015 * <ul>
016 *   <li>{@code tableContainerLocator} - Identifies the table container element.</li>
017 *   <li>{@code rowsLocator} - Identifies the rows inside the table.</li>
018 *   <li>{@code headerRowLocator} - Identifies the header row.</li>
019 * </ul>
020 *
021 * <p>The table framework uses this annotation at runtime to extract table structure
022 * and dynamically read or manipulate table data.
023 *
024 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
025 */
026@Target(ElementType.TYPE)
027@Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)
028public @interface TableInfo {
029
030   /**
031    * Locator for identifying the table container.
032    *
033    * @return the {@link FindBy} annotation specifying the table container locator.
034    */
035   FindBy tableContainerLocator();
036
037   /**
038    * Locator for identifying the rows inside the table.
039    *
040    * @return the {@link FindBy} annotation specifying the rows locator.
041    */
042   FindBy rowsLocator();
043
044   /**
045    * Locator for identifying the table's header row.
046    *
047    * @return the {@link FindBy} annotation specifying the header row locator.
048    */
049   FindBy headerRowLocator();
050
051}
